sense.def:
The function of something or someone
je namen ali vloga nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: The essential function of trade unions is to bargain with employers.
The brain performs three functions: recording, recalling, and analysing.

sense.def:
Kadar stroj ali sistem
functions
, deluje.

seg.quote: The phone didn't function at all.
...an idea of how the civil service functions.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
functions as a particular thing
, opravlja določeno delo ali uresničuje namen neke stvari.

seg.quote: The room had previously functioned as a playroom.
I found myself functioning as an ambassador.
The supply of money was a function of the amount of gold discovered.

sense.def:
A function
je tudi velika uradna večerja ali zabava.

seg.quote: He had been invited to a function at the college.
